Reviews.Title: Surprised
Reviews.Author: MeganM
Reviews.Content: I'm very shocked that this phone came as fast as it did. I'm also very shocked that it didn't come with any type of charger. Nothing I can find in the listing says anything about it not coming with one. Thankfully I found a charger to purchase for less than five dollars but I would be more cautious the next time I'm looking to buy a phone for my mother.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Rosa Valle
Reviews.Content: Bought a simple and easy phone for my dad, and searched and searched till I found this phone. I did not want a smart phone but a simple phone and this works great. Easy to use, sturdy, big numbers, and cool games as well. Came with a charger and the phone arrived very quickly.
